    Certifications & Honors

    Honors & Awards

    3rd Place — CMRxRecon 2025 (Task 1)

    MICCAI · Daejeon, South Korea · Sep 2025

    Our team KNSynapse earned 3rd place in Task 1: Multi-center evaluation and 5th place in Task 2: Multiple diseases evaluation at the CMRxRecon 2025 challenge—targeting foundation-model cardiac MRI reconstruction that generalizes across multi-center, multi-vendor, and multi-disease settings (10+ centers, ~18 disease types).

    Final rankings

    Best Bachelor’s Project Award — Full Score

    Shahid Beheshti University · Sept 2025

    Thesis on accelerated cardiac MRI reconstruction: an unrolled framework with frequency-aware modules and an input-aware Mixture-of-Experts that reconstructs full k-space from subsampled data, outperforming last year’s benchmarks with roughly two-thirds of the parameters.

    Third Place — 17th IranOpen RoboCup 2023 (2D Soccer Simulation)

    Associated with Shahid Beheshti University · Issued Apr 2023

    Developed intelligent agents with optimized roles for goalkeeping, defense, and teamwork; earned quota for World RoboCup France 2023.
